Topic Summary: Appeal against VAT and Income Tax assessments raised by the Revenue Commissioners, regarding the undeclared sale of imported goods.
Tax Legislation: Section 959AH(1), section 959AC of the TCA 1997, section 959V of the TCA 1997, section 77A of the Value Added Tax Consolidation Act 2010 ("VATCA 2010"), section 99(4) of the VATCA 2010.
